thread.title: Saturday Night Live: Scarlett Johansson to host for fifth time | tv | Hindustan Times
thread.title_full: Saturday Night Live: Scarlett Johansson to host for fifth time | tv | Hindustan Times

title: Saturday Night Live: Scarlett Johansson to host for fifth time | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Saturday Night Live: Scarlett Johansson to host for fifth time 
This will be the fifth time she will host the late night sketch comedy. The Avengers: Age of Ultron actor will be joining Ben Affleck, Candice Bergen and Justin Timberlake. tv Updated: Feb 24, 2017 18:08 IST IANS Los Angeles Scarlett Johansson will be promoting her new movie Ghost in the Shell on the TV show on March 11, which is set to release on March 31. (AFP) 
Actor Scarlett Johansson is back at Saturday Night Live . The makers on Thursday announced that the Lucy actor will host the TV show on March 11. This will be the fifth time she will host the late night sketch comedy, joining Ben Affleck, Candice Bergen and Justin Timberlake. Read more Kristen Stewart nervous about hosting Saturday Night Live 
The Avengers: Age of Ultron actor will be promoting her new movie Ghost in the Shell, which is set to release on March 31. 
The announcement was made on Saturday Night Live Twitter page, reports aceshowbiz.com. The makers posted a photograph which featured sticky notes with the hosts and music guests for March 4 and 11 episodes written on them. Very excited to announce our March shows! #SNL pic.twitter.com/fmjjkeq8Vc â€” Saturday Night Live (@nbcsnl) February 23, 2017 
Lorde will be the musical guest, making her debut solo performance on Saturday Night Live. 
Johansson previously hosted the show on January 14, 2006, April 21, 2007, November 13, 2010 and on May 2, 2015. tags
